q: However, talk of the former Nicole Scherzinger 's possible arrival has apparently got Cheryl Cole worried she will be eclipsed by her if they do work together on the series. A source told the Daily Mirror newspaper: Cheryl Cole 's been straight with Simon Cowell but suddenly people aren't returning her calls. She doesn't want to get into a put-up scrap with Nicole Scherzinger with Simon Cowell playing the puppet master. Although he wants Nicole Scherzinger , Simon Cowell still hasn't made a final decision on the line-up and his stalling is said to be concerning TV chiefs who want the judging panel to be signed off.

business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership'', according to the official Google blog spot. Mr Eric Schmidt would continue to act as an advisor to Mr Page and co-founder Mr Sergey Brin . Page will take charge of Google's day-to-day operations as Chief Executive Officer starting April 4. Sergey Brin will focus on strategic projects, in particular working on new products, Mr Eric Schmidt said in the blog spot. The management reshuffle has been brought about to ''streamline decision making and create clearer lines of responsibility and accountability'' at the top of the company, he added

. Zahi Hawass wrote, in a post to his Web site, which, due to the blocked Internet access at the time, he had to fax to colleagues in Italy to upload: My heart is broken and my blood is boiling. I feel that everything I have done in the last nine years has been destroyed in one day, but all the inspectors, young archaeologists, and administrators, are calling me from sites and museums all over Egypt to tell me that they will give their life to protect our antiquities. On Saturday, he wrote, ''I was met outside by many Egyptians, who asked if the museum was safe and what they could do to help. The people were happy to see

In this new role I know he will merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly'', says Eric Schmidt before adding: I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry will be even better! Larry, in my clear opinion, is ready to lead. According to the blog post, '' Sergey Brin has decided to devote his time and energy to strategic projects, in particular working on new products. order.'' And one of his chief political assets, observers say, could be that he is popular among fiscal and social conservatives, and among insiders and outsiders in the Republican Party. He bridges that divide effortlessly. He's got what the tea party crowd wants to hear, and he's obviously got Republican credentials as well. He can be a unifying candidate, said Robert Dion , a political science professor at the University of Evansville.
